programme.title: VPI: Vinnie Politan Investigates
programme.desc: Vinnie Politan takes a deep dive into the true crime stories that are captivating the world over.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: After being drawn into the world of bondage and domination, a college student ends up dead, leaving authorities to investigate whether it was an accident or murder.

programme.title: Closing Arguments with Vinnie Politan
programme.desc: The most compelling legal stories of the day from Court TV's team of world class legal journalists.

programme.title: VPI: Vinnie Politan Investigates
programme.desc: Vinnie Politan takes a deep dive into the true crime stories that are captivating the world over.

programme.title: Victim to Verdict: Murdaugh Family Murders
programme.sub-title: Victim to Verdict: Murdaugh Family Murders
programme.desc: Once prominent South Carolina attorney Alex Murdaugh's life begins to unravel after the murders of his wife, Maggie and youngest son Paul as an investigation uncovers years of drug abuse and theft of millions of dollars.

programme.title: Victim to Verdict: Doomsday Cult Mom
programme.sub-title: Victim to Verdict: Doomsday Cult Mom
programme.desc: When Lori Vallow's children go missing, she moves to Hawaii and marries cult leader Chad Daybell, leaving behind a path of destruction and several dead bodies in her wake.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: A former army medic devises a sick plan to kidnap women, impregnate them and keep them in his basement as part of a personal baby farm.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: A scorned mistress hires a group of derelicts to kill her lover's wife and denies any involvement in the crime, not knowing she had been caught on camera.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: A loving father vanishes without a trace in central California, setting off a feverish missing person's investigation revealing he had been murdered by the woman he used to trust with his life.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: A preacher and his protege run a scam through the Internet to rob victims, steal their identities and discard their bodies.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: Law enforcement spends nearly two years trying to hunt down a gunman who tried to take out an entire family one by one as they entered their house.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: The savage murder of a rabbi's wife is passed off as a robbery gone wrong, but years later, a co-conspirator's confession helps bring the truth to the surface.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: A serial predator targets men at gay bars, leaving a trail of dead bodies along the southeastern United States. Cops struggle to play catch up, until the perpetrator leaves behind a key piece of evidence at a crime scene.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: The murder of a man inside his suburban Los Angeles home sets off a chain reaction of murder, conspiracy, and furious cover ups, which ultimately point back to a mastermind who's in it for the money.

programme.desc: Vinnie Politan takes a deep dive into the true crime stories that are captivating the world over.

programme.title: Opening Statements With Julie Grant
programme.desc: Former prosecutor Julie Grant is joined by a team of top trial attorneys and forensic experts to cover the high-stakes trials that are on the docket, and the crime cases dominating the headlines.

programme.desc: Gavel-to-gavel coverage and legal analysis of the nation's most compelling trials.
